body:
I was going to comment "why can't they clearly specify which CUDA version is supported in the installation docs", but then I re-checked the installation docs just to be sure and this is what I found:
![install tensorflow on windows tensorflow](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/29166153/43369202-63f41704-9387-11e8-81f1-cf133babb048.png)

Lesson learned: **Read the docs carefully if you don't want to waste your valuable time.**
